name: Spirit Spree
description:
GPG212 - Point&Click - Spirit Spree

Spirit Spree Asset List

TAB - in game menu

In each level you have 60 seconds to capture all 6 ghosts,

Your cursor will turn into a magnifying glass when it is over certain objects, use LEFT CLICK to search for ghosts 

Once found, ghosts will start to fly around the screen, use LEFT CLICK to capture them
